biotools.summary: Biomedical Research Software as a Service that enables biomedical & translational researchers to securely manage and combine datasets, typically for patient cohorts. A suite of cloud enabled & integrated open source applications can be accessed in a browser, which make it easier for researchers to manage their studies. Sensitive data can be secured and only accessible to those with permission.
